Name: The Red Exile
About the game: The Red Exile â€“ is a survival horror game. The main feature of the game is the procedurally generated map. Play again and again, because each game session is unique and inimitable! Perform an exile rite before being discovered. Be on the alert, death can be waiting for you at every corner. The one who follows you knows neither pity nor compassion. The only thing that remains clear is the desire to hurt. Key Features Procedutal Generation Enjoy the replayability, because the level is generated in a new way every time, which makes each game session truly unique and unrepeatable! Perks Unlock new abilities, collect a unique combination and go into battle. Artificial Intelligence A sophisticated artificial intelligence of a maniac, which analyzes the activity of the player to find him. Increasing Complexity Maniac gets stronger as the match progresses.
